&reftitle.install;
To include Java support in your PHP build you must add the option --with-java[=DIR] where DIR points to the base install directory of your JDK. This extension can only be built as a shared dl. More build instructions for this extension can be found in php-src/ext/java/README.
Note to Win32 Users
In order to enable this module on a Windows environment with PHP <= 4.0.6, you must copy jvm.dll from the DLL folder of the PHP/Win32 binary package to the SYSTEM32 folder of your windows machine. (Ex: C:\WINNT\SYSTEM32 or C:\WINDOWS\SYSTEM32). For PHP > 4.0.6 you do not need any additional dll file.
